name: Web Solo Exhibition - Exploring Online Exhibition Formats Leveraging the Web
description: Due to the outbreak of COVID-19 around the end of 2019, numerous physical exhibitions were canceled or postponed, and those that were held faced significant restrictions. In response, there has been an increase in exhibitions available for viewing on websites. However, many of these online exhibitions primarily aim to replicate physical exhibitions, serving largely as substitutes for the real-life events disrupted by the pandemic. This project focuses on leveraging the unique characteristics of the web as a medium to create online exhibitions that aim to excite and engage viewers.
